info.title: LNbits API
info.description: API for LNbits, the free and open source bitcoin wallet and accounts system with plugins.

post.description: Login via the username and password

get.description: show the current balance of the node and the LNbits database
show the current listeners and other monitoring data

schema.title: Response Api Restart Server Admin Api V1 Restart Get
Response Topup Admin Api V1 Topup Put

get.description: Check if node api can be enabled

schema.title: Response Api Get Channels Node Api V1 Channels Get
Response Api Delete Channel Node Api V1 Channels Delete
Response Api Get Peers Node Api V1 Peers Get
Response Payment List Api V1 Payments Get

post.description:
This endpoint can be used both to generate and pay a BOLT11 invoice.
        To generate a new invoice for receiving funds into the authorized account,
        specify at least the first four fields in the POST body: `out: false`,
        `amount`, `unit`, and `memo`. To pay an arbitrary invoice from the funds
        already in the authorized account, specify `out: true` and use the `bolt11`
        field to supply the BOLT11 invoice to be paid.

schema.title: Response Get Payments History Api V1 Payments History Get

get.description: Get basic info for all of user's wallets.

schema.title: Response Wallets Api V1 Wallets Get
Response Api List Currencies Available Api V1 Currencies Get
Response Api Tpos Create Invoice Tpos Api V1 Tposs  Tpos Id  Invoices Post
Response Api Tpos Create Withdraw Tpos Api V1 Atm Withdraw  Withdraw Token   Amount  Get
